channel.title: 8 Plays A Week
channel.description: 8 new songs by 8 exciting new independent bands each week! You vote to decide who goes on to next weeks show.

image.title: 8 Plays A Week
image.description: David Beach brings you the lastest in unsigned, independant bands.

channel.itunes:author: david.beach@yakkyakk.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: David Beach brings you the lastest in unsigned, independant bands.
channel.itunes:summary: 8 new songs by 8 exciting new independent bands each week! You vote to decide who goes on to next weeks show.
channel.itunes:keywords: Yakk, independant music, unsigned bands, indy, Yakkyakk, Yakkyakk.com

item.title: Season Premiere
item.description:
8 Plays A Week Show 1

1. 9-Yards – Elevate My Mind

2. Burning the Bridge – Runaway Tomorrow

3. The Secret Society Of The Sonic Six – Bad Citizen

4. Velvet Chain – Sea Of Tranquility

5. Steve Marshall – B.A. Clown

6. Where’s Moo – Float

7. Corey Landis – Scene From An Alaskan Draft Board

8. Blake Collins – Olive
item.itunes:author: david.beach@yakkyakk.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 8 Plays A Week Show 1 9-Yards, Burning the Bridge, The Secret Society Of The Sonic Six, Velvet Chain, Steve Marshall, Where’s Moo, Corey Landis, Blake Collins

Velvet Chain – Sea Of Tranquility 5. Steve Marshall – B.A. Clown 6. Where’s Moo – Float 7. Corey Landis – Scene From An Alaskan Draft Board 8. Blake Collins – Olive

item.title: Week 2
item.description:
8 Plays A Week Show 2

1. Velvet Chain – Sea Of Tranquility

2. Jose Promis – Barfly

3. Noah King – Forgiveness

4. Dawn of Redemption – Just Bring It

5. The Moon Crickets – Down On You

6. Brain Trust – Robot

7. Steve Marshall – B.A. Clown

8. The Secret Society Of The Sonic Six – Bad Citizen

item.title: Week 3
item.description:
8 Plays A Week Show 3

1. Steve Marshall – B.A. Clown

2. Swamp House

3. Paperback Hero – For You

4. David Stapleton – The Best Thing

5. Blade – ‘Old School’ Tip

6. Ecotonic – Same Old Story

7. Noah King – Forgiveness

8. Brain Trust – Robot
